short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save time by generating Shopify discount links that automatically applies a discount at checkout

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shopify only allows you to generate a discount code link to the homepage or collection page. Using Taplinkr, you can generate a link to any page on your Shopify store.

Increase your discount usage & ecommerce conversion rate by using these automatic discount URLs in promotional emails or across socials, where you want to send the customer right to a specific product/page and automatically apply a discount on checkout.

Maximize productivity and save time with Taplinkr.
